00141 int
00142 Cudd_zddReduceHeap(
00143   DdManager * table /* DD manager */,
00144   Cudd_ReorderingType heuristic /* method used for reordering */,
00145   int minsize /* bound below which no reordering occurs */)
00146 {
00147     DdHook       *hook;
00148     int          result;
00149     unsigned int nextDyn;
00150 #ifdef DD_STATS
00151     unsigned int initialSize;
00152     unsigned int finalSize;
00153 #endif
00154     long         localTime;
00155 
00156     /* Don't reorder if there are too many dead nodes. */
00157     if (table->keysZ - table->deadZ < (unsigned) minsize)
00158         return(1);
00159 
00160     if (heuristic == CUDD_REORDER_SAME) {
00161         heuristic = table->autoMethodZ;
00162     }
00163     if (heuristic == CUDD_REORDER_NONE) {
00164         return(1);
00165     }
00166 
00167     /* This call to Cudd_zddReduceHeap does initiate reordering. Therefore
00168     ** we count it.
00169     */
00170     table->reorderings++;
00171     empty = table->zero;
00172 
00173     localTime = util_cpu_time();
00174 
00175     /* Run the hook functions. */
00176     hook = table->preReorderingHook;
00177     while (hook != NULL) {
00178         int res = (hook->f)(table,(void *)heuristic);
00179         if (res == 0) return(0);
00180         hook = hook->next;
00181     }
00182 
00183     /* Clear the cache and collect garbage. */
00184     zddReorderPreprocess(table);
00185     zddTotalNumberSwapping = 0;
00186 
00187 #ifdef DD_STATS
00188     initialSize = table->keysZ;
00189 
00190     switch(heuristic) {
00191     case CUDD_REORDER_RANDOM:
00192     case CUDD_REORDER_RANDOM_PIVOT:
00193         (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:I_RANDOM  ");
00194         break;
00195     case CUDD_REORDER_SIFT:
00196     case CUDD_REORDER_SIFT_CONVERGE:
00197     case CUDD_REORDER_SYMM_SIFT:
00198     case CUDD_REORDER_SYMM_SIFT_CONV:
00199         (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:I_SIFTING ");
00200         break;
00201     case CUDD_REORDER_LINEAR:
00202     case CUDD_REORDER_LINEAR_CONVERGE:
00203         (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:I_LINSIFT ");
00204         break;
00205     default:
00206         (void) fprintf(stderr,"Unsupported ZDD reordering method\n");
00207         return(0);
00208     }
00209     (void) fprintf(stdout,"%8d: initial size",initialSize); 
00210 #endif
00211 
00212     result = cuddZddTreeSifting(table,heuristic);
00213 
00214 #ifdef DD_STATS
00215     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00216     finalSize = table->keysZ;
00217     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:F_REORDER %8d: final size\n",finalSize); 
00218     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:T_REORDER %8g: total time (sec)\n",
00219                    ((double)(util_cpu_time() - localTime)/1000.0)); 
00220     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:N_REORDER %8d: total swaps\n",
00221                    zddTotalNumberSwapping);
00222 #endif
00223 
00224     if (result == 0)
00225         return(0);
00226 
00227     if (!zddReorderPostprocess(table))
00228         return(0);
00229 
00230     if (table->realignZ) {
00231         if (!cuddBddAlignToZdd(table))
00232             return(0);
00233     }
00234 
00235     nextDyn = table->keysZ * DD_DYN_RATIO;
00236     if (table->reorderings < 20 || nextDyn > table->nextDyn)
00237         table->nextDyn = nextDyn;
00238     else
00239         table->nextDyn += 20;
00240 
00241     table->reordered = 1;
00242 
00243     /* Run hook functions. */
00244     hook = table->postReorderingHook;
00245     while (hook != NULL) {
00246         int res = (hook->f)(table,(void *)localTime);
00247         if (res == 0) return(0);
00248         hook = hook->next;
00249     }
00250     /* Update cumulative reordering time. */
00251     table->reordTime += util_cpu_time() - localTime;
00252 
00253     return(result);
00254 
00255 } /* end of Cudd_zddReduceHeap */

00274 int
00275 Cudd_zddShuffleHeap(
00276   DdManager * table /* DD manager */,
00277   int * permutation /* required variable permutation */)
00278 {
00279 
00280     int result;
00281 
00282     empty = table->zero;
00283     zddReorderPreprocess(table);
00284 
00285     result = zddShuffle(table,permutation);
00286 
00287     if (!zddReorderPostprocess(table)) return(0);
00288 
00289     return(result);
00290 
00291 } /* end of Cudd_zddShuffleHeap */

00322 int
00323 cuddZddAlignToBdd(
00324   DdManager * table /* DD manager */)
00325 {
00326     int *invpermZ;              /* permutation array */
00327     int M;                      /* ratio of ZDD variables to BDD variables */
00328     int i,j;                    /* loop indices */
00329     int result;                 /* return value */
00330 
00331     /* We assume that a ratio of 0 is OK. */
00332     if (table->sizeZ == 0)
00333         return(1);
00334 
00335     empty = table->zero;
00336     M = table->sizeZ / table->size;
00337     /* Check whether the number of ZDD variables is a multiple of the
00338     ** number of BDD variables.
00339     */
00340     if (M * table->size != table->sizeZ)
00341         return(0);
00342     /* Create and initialize the inverse permutation array. */
00343     invpermZ = ALLOC(int,table->sizeZ);
00344     if (invpermZ == NULL) {
00345         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00346         return(0);
00347     }
00348     for (i = 0; i < table->size; i++) {
00349         int index = table->invperm[i];
00350         int indexZ = index * M;
00351         int levelZ = table->permZ[indexZ];
00352         levelZ = (levelZ / M) * M;
00353         for (j = 0; j < M; j++) {
00354             invpermZ[M * i + j] = table->invpermZ[levelZ + j];
00355         }
00356     }
00357     /* Eliminate dead nodes. Do not scan the cache again, because we
00358     ** assume that Cudd_ReduceHeap has already cleared it.
00359     */
00360     cuddGarbageCollectZdd(table,0);
00361 
00362     result = zddShuffle(table, invpermZ);
00363     FREE(invpermZ);
00364     /* Fix the ZDD variable group tree. */
00365     zddFixTree(table,table->treeZ);
00366     return(result);
00367     
00368 } /* end of cuddZddAlignToBdd */

00430 cuddZddUniqueCompare(

00433 {

00435

00454 int
00455 cuddZddSwapInPlace(
00456   DdManager * table,
00457   int  x,
00458   int  y)
00459 {
00460 #ifdef __osf__
00461 #pragma pointer_size save
00462 #pragma pointer_size short
00463 #endif
00464     DdNode **xlist, **ylist;
00465 #ifdef __osf__
00466 #pragma pointer_size restore
00467 #endif
00468     int         xindex, yindex;
00469     int         xslots, yslots;
00470     int         xshift, yshift;
00471     int         oldxkeys, oldykeys;
00472     int         newxkeys, newykeys;
00473     int         i;
00474     int         posn;
00475     DdNode      *f, *f1, *f0, *f11, *f10, *f01, *f00;
00476     DdNode      *newf1 = NULL, *newf0, *g, *next, *last, *previous;
00477 
00478 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00479     assert(x < y);
00480     assert(cuddZddNextHigh(table,x) == y);
00481     assert(table->subtableZ[x].keys != 0);
00482     assert(table->subtableZ[y].keys != 0);
00483     assert(table->subtableZ[x].dead == 0);
00484     assert(table->subtableZ[y].dead == 0);
00485 #endif
00486 
00487     zddTotalNumberSwapping++;
00488 
00489     /* Get parameters of x subtable. */
00490     xindex   = table->invpermZ[x];
00491     xlist    = table->subtableZ[x].nodelist;
00492     oldxkeys = table->subtableZ[x].keys;
00493     xslots   = table->subtableZ[x].slots;
00494     xshift   = table->subtableZ[x].shift;
00495     newxkeys = 0;
00496 
00497     yindex   = table->invpermZ[y];
00498     ylist    = table->subtableZ[y].nodelist;
00499     oldykeys = table->subtableZ[y].keys;
00500     yslots   = table->subtableZ[y].slots;
00501     yshift   = table->subtableZ[y].shift;
00502     newykeys = oldykeys;
00503 
00504     /* The nodes in the x layer that don't depend on y directly
00505     ** will stay there; the others are put in a chain.
00506     ** The chain is handled as a FIFO; g points to the beginning and
00507     ** last points to the end.
00508     */
00509 
00510     g = last = NULL;
00511     for (i = 0; i < xslots; i++) {
00512         f = xlist[i];
00513         previous = NULL;
00514         while (f != NULL) {
00515             next = f->next;
00516             f1 = cuddT(f); f0 = cuddE(f);
00517             if ((f1->index != (DdHalfWord) yindex) &&
00518                 (f0->index != (DdHalfWord) yindex)) { /* stays */
00519                 newxkeys++;
00520                 previous = f;
00521             } else {
00522                 f->index = yindex;
00523                 if (previous == NULL) {
00524                     xlist[i] = next;
00525                 } else {
00526                     previous->next = next;
00527                 }
00528                 f->next = NULL;
00529                 if (last == NULL) {
00530                     last = g = f;
00531                 } else {
00532                     last->next = f;
00533                     last = f;
00534                 }
00535             }
00536             f = next;
00537         } /* while there are elements in the collision chain */
00538     } /* for each slot of the x subtable */
00539 
00540 
00541     /* Take care of the x nodes that must be re-expressed.
00542     ** They form a linked list pointed by g. Their index has been
00543     ** changed to yindex already.
00544     */
00545     f = g;
00546 
00547     while (f != NULL) {
00548         next = f->next;
00549         /* Find f1, f0, f11, f10, f01, f00. */
00550         f1 = cuddT(f);
00551         if ((int) f1->index == yindex) {
00552             f11 = cuddT(f1); f10 = cuddE(f1);
00553         } else {
00554             f11 = empty; f10 = f1;
00555         }
00556         f0 = cuddE(f);
00557         if ((int) f0->index == yindex) {
00558             f01 = cuddT(f0); f00 = cuddE(f0);
00559         } else {
00560             f01 = empty; f00 = f0;
00561         }
00562 
00563         /* Decrease ref count of f1. */
00564         cuddSatDec(f1->ref);
00565         /* Create the new T child. */
00566         if (f11 == empty) {
00567             if (f01 != empty) {
00568                 newf1 = f01;
00569                 cuddSatInc(newf1->ref);
00570             }
00571             /* else case was already handled when finding nodes
00572             ** with both children below level y
00573             */
00574         } else {
00575             /* Check xlist for triple (xindex, f11, f01). */
00576             posn = ddHash(f11, f01, xshift);
00577             /* For each element newf1 in collision list xlist[posn]. */
00578             newf1 = xlist[posn];
00579             while (newf1 != NULL) {
00580                 if (cuddT(newf1) == f11 && cuddE(newf1) == f01) {
00581                     cuddSatInc(newf1->ref);
00582                     break; /* match */
00583                 }
00584                 newf1 = newf1->next;
00585             } /* while newf1 */
00586             if (newf1 == NULL) {        /* no match */
00587                 newf1 = cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00588                 if (newf1 == NULL)
00589                     goto zddSwapOutOfMem;
00590                 newf1->index = xindex; newf1->ref = 1;
00591                 cuddT(newf1) = f11;
00592                 cuddE(newf1) = f01;
00593                 /* Insert newf1 in the collision list xlist[pos];
00594                 ** increase the ref counts of f11 and f01
00595                 */
00596                 newxkeys++;
00597                 newf1->next = xlist[posn];
00598                 xlist[posn] = newf1;
00599                 cuddSatInc(f11->ref);
00600                 cuddSatInc(f01->ref);
00601             }
00602         }
00603         cuddT(f) = newf1;
00604 
00605         /* Do the same for f0. */
00606         /* Decrease ref count of f0. */
00607         cuddSatDec(f0->ref);
00608         /* Create the new E child. */
00609         if (f10 == empty) {
00610             newf0 = f00;
00611             cuddSatInc(newf0->ref);
00612         } else {
00613             /* Check xlist for triple (xindex, f10, f00). */
00614             posn = ddHash(f10, f00, xshift);
00615             /* For each element newf0 in collision list xlist[posn]. */
00616             newf0 = xlist[posn];
00617             while (newf0 != NULL) {
00618                 if (cuddT(newf0) == f10 && cuddE(newf0) == f00) {
00619                     cuddSatInc(newf0->ref);
00620                     break; /* match */
00621                 }
00622                 newf0 = newf0->next;
00623             } /* while newf0 */
00624             if (newf0 == NULL) {        /* no match */
00625                 newf0 = cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00626                 if (newf0 == NULL)
00627                     goto zddSwapOutOfMem;
00628                 newf0->index = xindex; newf0->ref = 1;
00629                 cuddT(newf0) = f10; cuddE(newf0) = f00;
00630                 /* Insert newf0 in the collision list xlist[posn];
00631                 ** increase the ref counts of f10 and f00.
00632                 */
00633                 newxkeys++;
00634                 newf0->next = xlist[posn];
00635                 xlist[posn] = newf0;
00636                 cuddSatInc(f10->ref);
00637                 cuddSatInc(f00->ref);
00638             }
00639         }
00640         cuddE(f) = newf0;
00641 
00642         /* Insert the modified f in ylist.
00643         ** The modified f does not already exists in ylist.
00644         ** (Because of the uniqueness of the cofactors.)
00645         */
00646         posn = ddHash(newf1, newf0, yshift);
00647         newykeys++;
00648         f->next = ylist[posn];
00649         ylist[posn] = f;
00650         f = next;
00651     } /* while f != NULL */
00652 
00653     /* GC the y layer. */
00654 
00655     /* For each node f in ylist. */
00656     for (i = 0; i < yslots; i++) {
00657         previous = NULL;
00658         f = ylist[i];
00659         while (f != NULL) {
00660             next = f->next;
00661             if (f->ref == 0) {
00662                 cuddSatDec(cuddT(f)->ref);
00663                 cuddSatDec(cuddE(f)->ref);
00664                 cuddDeallocNode(table, f);
00665                 newykeys--;
00666                 if (previous == NULL)
00667                     ylist[i] = next;
00668                 else
00669                     previous->next = next;
00670             } else {
00671                 previous = f;
00672             }
00673             f = next;
00674         } /* while f */
00675     } /* for i */
00676 
00677     /* Set the appropriate fields in table. */
00678     table->subtableZ[x].nodelist = ylist;
00679     table->subtableZ[x].slots    = yslots;
00680     table->subtableZ[x].shift    = yshift;
00681     table->subtableZ[x].keys     = newykeys;
00682     table->subtableZ[x].maxKeys  = yslots * DD_MAX_SUBTABLE_DENSITY;
00683 
00684     table->subtableZ[y].nodelist = xlist;
00685     table->subtableZ[y].slots    = xslots;
00686     table->subtableZ[y].shift    = xshift;
00687     table->subtableZ[y].keys     = newxkeys;
00688     table->subtableZ[y].maxKeys  = xslots * DD_MAX_SUBTABLE_DENSITY;
00689 
00690     table->permZ[xindex] = y; table->permZ[yindex] = x;
00691     table->invpermZ[x] = yindex; table->invpermZ[y] = xindex;
00692 
00693     table->keysZ += newxkeys + newykeys - oldxkeys - oldykeys;
00694 
00695     /* Update univ section; univ[x] remains the same. */
00696     table->univ[y] = cuddT(table->univ[x]);
00697 
00698     return (table->keysZ);
00699 
00700 zddSwapOutOfMem:
00701     (void) fprintf(stderr, "Error: cuddZddSwapInPlace() out of memory\n");
00702 
00703     return (0);
00704 
00705 } /* end of cuddZddSwapInPlace */
00706 
00707 
00728 int
00729 cuddZddSwapping(
00730   DdManager * table,
00731   int lower,
00732   int upper,
00733   Cudd_ReorderingType heuristic)
00734 {
00735     int i, j;
00736     int max, keys;
00737     int nvars;
00738     int x, y;
00739     int iterate;
00740     int previousSize;
00741     Move *moves, *move;
00742     int pivot = 0;
00743     int modulo;
00744     int result;
00745 
00746 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00747     /* Sanity check */
00748     assert(lower >= 0 && upper < table->sizeZ && lower <= upper);
00749 #endif
00750 
00751     nvars = upper - lower + 1;
00752     iterate = nvars;
00753 
00754     for (i = 0; i < iterate; i++) {
00755         if (heuristic == CUDD_REORDER_RANDOM_PIVOT) {
00756             /* Find pivot <= id with maximum keys. */
00757             for (max = -1, j = lower; j <= upper; j++) {
00758                 if ((keys = table->subtableZ[j].keys) > max) {
00759                     max = keys;
00760                     pivot = j;
00761                 }
00762             }
00763 
00764             modulo = upper - pivot;
00765             if (modulo == 0) {
00766                 y = pivot;      /* y = nvars-1 */
00767             } else {
00768                 /* y = random # from {pivot+1 .. nvars-1} */
00769                 y = pivot + 1 + (int) (Cudd_Random() % modulo);
00770             }
00771 
00772             modulo = pivot - lower - 1;
00773             if (modulo < 1) {   /* if pivot = 1 or 0 */
00774                 x = lower;
00775             } else {
00776                 do { /* x = random # from {0 .. pivot-2} */
00777                     x = (int) Cudd_Random() % modulo;
00778                 } while (x == y);
00779                   /* Is this condition really needed, since x and y
00780                      are in regions separated by pivot? */
00781             }
00782         } else {
00783             x = (int) (Cudd_Random() % nvars) + lower;
00784             do {
00785                 y = (int) (Cudd_Random() % nvars) + lower;
00786             } while (x == y);
00787         }
00788 
00789         previousSize = table->keysZ;
00790         moves = zddSwapAny(table, x, y);
00791         if (moves == NULL)
00792             goto cuddZddSwappingOutOfMem;
00793 
00794         result = cuddZddSiftingBackward(table, moves, previousSize);
00795         if (!result)
00796             goto cuddZddSwappingOutOfMem;
00797 
00798         while (moves != NULL) {
00799             move = moves->next;
00800             cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
00801             moves = move;
00802         }
00803 #ifdef DD_STATS
00804         if (table->keysZ < (unsigned) previousSize) {
00805             (void) fprintf(stdout,"-");
00806         } else if (table->keysZ > (unsigned) previousSize) {
00807             (void) fprintf(stdout,"+"); /* should never happen */
00808         } else {
00809             (void) fprintf(stdout,"=");
00810         }
00811         fflush(stdout);
00812 #endif
00813     }
00814 
00815     return(1);
00816 
00817 cuddZddSwappingOutOfMem:
00818     while (moves != NULL) {
00819         move = moves->next;
00820         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
00821         moves = move;
00822     }
00823     return(0);
00824 
00825 } /* end of cuddZddSwapping */
00826 
00827 
00849 int
00850 cuddZddSifting(
00851   DdManager * table,
00852   int  lower,
00853   int  upper)
00854 {
00855     int i;
00856     int *var;
00857     int size;
00858     int x;
00859     int result;
00860 #ifdef DD_STATS
00861     int previousSize;
00862 #endif
00863 
00864     size = table->sizeZ;
00865 
00866     /* Find order in which to sift variables. */
00867     var = NULL;
00868     zdd_entry = ALLOC(int, size);
00869     if (zdd_entry == NULL) {
00870         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00871         goto cuddZddSiftingOutOfMem;
00872     }
00873     var = ALLOC(int, size);
00874     if (var == NULL) {
00875         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00876         goto cuddZddSiftingOutOfMem;
00877     }
00878 
00879     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00880         x = table->permZ[i];
00881         zdd_entry[i] = table->subtableZ[x].keys;
00882         var[i] = i;
00883     }
00884 
00885     qsort((void *)var, size, sizeof(int), (int (*)(const void *, const void *))cuddZddUniqueCompare);
00886 
00887     /* Now sift. */
00888     for (i = 0; i < ddMin(table->siftMaxVar, size); i++) {
00889         if (zddTotalNumberSwapping >= table->siftMaxSwap)
00890             break;
00891         x = table->permZ[var[i]];
00892         if (x < lower || x > upper) continue;
00893 #ifdef DD_STATS
00894         previousSize = table->keysZ;
00895 #endif
00896         result = cuddZddSiftingAux(table, x, lower, upper);
00897         if (!result)
00898             goto cuddZddSiftingOutOfMem;
00899 #ifdef DD_STATS
00900         if (table->keysZ < (unsigned) previousSize) {
00901             (void) fprintf(stdout,"-");
00902         } else if (table->keysZ > (unsigned) previousSize) {
00903             (void) fprintf(stdout,"+"); /* should never happen */
00904             (void) fprintf(stdout,"\nSize increased from %d to %d while sifting variable %d\n", previousSize, table->keysZ , var[i]);
00905         } else {
00906             (void) fprintf(stdout,"=");
00907         }
00908         fflush(stdout);
00909 #endif
00910     }
00911 
00912     FREE(var);
00913     FREE(zdd_entry);
00914 
00915     return(1);
00916 
00917 cuddZddSiftingOutOfMem:
00918 
00919     if (zdd_entry != NULL) FREE(zdd_entry);
00920     if (var != NULL) FREE(var);
00921 
00922     return(0);
00923 
00924 } /* end of cuddZddSifting */
00925 
00926 
00927 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00928 /* Definition of static functions                                            */
00929 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00930 
00931 
00943 static Move *
00944 zddSwapAny(
00945   DdManager * table,
00946   int  x,
00947   int  y)
00948 {
00949     Move        *move, *moves;
00950     int         tmp, size;
00951     int         x_ref, y_ref;
00952     int         x_next, y_next;
00953     int         limit_size;
00954 
00955     if (x > y) {        /* make x precede y */
00956         tmp = x; x = y; y = tmp;
00957     }
00958 
00959     x_ref = x; y_ref = y;
00960 
00961     x_next = cuddZddNextHigh(table, x);
00962     y_next = cuddZddNextLow(table, y);
00963     moves = NULL;
00964     limit_size = table->keysZ;
00965 
00966     for (;;) {
00967         if (x_next == y_next) { /* x < x_next = y_next < y */
00968             size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table, x, x_next);
00969             if (size == 0)
00970                 goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
00971             move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00972             if (move == NULL)
00973                 goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
00974             move->x = x;
00975             move->y = x_next;
00976             move->size = size;
00977             move->next = moves;
00978             moves = move;
00979 
00980             size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table, y_next, y);
00981             if (size == 0)
00982                 goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
00983             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00984             if (move == NULL)
00985                 goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
00986             move->x = y_next;
00987             move->y = y;
00988             move->size = size;
00989             move->next = moves;
00990             moves = move;
00991 
00992             size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table, x, x_next);
00993             if (size == 0)
00994                 goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
00995             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00996             if (move == NULL)
00997                 goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
00998             move->x = x;
00999             move->y = x_next;
01000             move->size = size;
01001             move->next = moves;
01002             moves = move;
01003 
01004             tmp = x; x = y; y = tmp;
01005 
01006         } else if (x == y_next) { /* x = y_next < y = x_next */
01007             size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table, x, x_next);
01008             if (size == 0)
01009                 goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01010             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01011             if (move == NULL)
01012                 goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01013             move->x = x;
01014             move->y = x_next;
01015             move->size = size;
01016             move->next = moves;
01017             moves = move;
01018 
01019             tmp = x; x = y;  y = tmp;
01020         } else {
01021             size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table, x, x_next);
01022             if (size == 0)
01023                 goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01024             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01025             if (move == NULL)
01026                 goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01027             move->x = x;
01028             move->y = x_next;
01029             move->size = size;
01030             move->next = moves;
01031             moves = move;
01032 
01033             size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table, y_next, y);
01034             if (size == 0)
01035                 goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01036             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01037             if (move == NULL)
01038                 goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01039             move->x = y_next;
01040             move->y = y;
01041             move->size = size;
01042             move->next = moves;
01043             moves = move;
01044 
01045             x = x_next; y = y_next;
01046         }
01047 
01048         x_next = cuddZddNextHigh(table, x);
01049         y_next = cuddZddNextLow(table, y);
01050         if (x_next > y_ref)
01051             break;      /* if x == y_ref */
01052 
01053         if ((double) size > table->maxGrowth * (double) limit_size)
01054             break;
01055         if (size < limit_size)
01056             limit_size = size;
01057     }
01058     if (y_next >= x_ref) {
01059         size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table, y_next, y);
01060         if (size == 0)
01061             goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01062         move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01063         if (move == NULL)
01064             goto zddSwapAnyOutOfMem;
01065         move->x = y_next;
01066         move->y = y;
01067         move->size = size;
01068         move->next = moves;
01069         moves = move;
01070     }
01071 
01072     return(moves);
01073 
01074 zddSwapAnyOutOfMem:
01075     while (moves != NULL) {
01076         move = moves->next;
01077         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *)moves);
01078         moves = move;
01079     }
01080     return(NULL);
01081 
01082 } /* end of zddSwapAny */
01083 
01084 
01099 static int
01100 cuddZddSiftingAux(
01101   DdManager * table,
01102   int  x,
01103   int  x_low,
01104   int  x_high)
01105 {
01106     Move        *move;
01107     Move        *moveUp;        /* list of up move */
01108     Move        *moveDown;      /* list of down move */
01109 
01110     int         initial_size;
01111     int         result;
01112 
01113     initial_size = table->keysZ;
01114 
01115 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
01116     assert(table->subtableZ[x].keys > 0);
01117 #endif
01118 
01119     moveDown = NULL;
01120     moveUp = NULL;
01121 
01122     if (x == x_low) {
01123         moveDown = cuddZddSiftingDown(table, x, x_high, initial_size);
01124         /* after that point x --> x_high */
01125         if (moveDown == NULL)
01126             goto cuddZddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01127         result = cuddZddSiftingBackward(table, moveDown,
01128             initial_size);
01129         /* move backward and stop at best position */
01130         if (!result)
01131             goto cuddZddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01132 
01133     }
01134     else if (x == x_high) {
01135         moveUp = cuddZddSiftingUp(table, x, x_low, initial_size);
01136         /* after that point x --> x_low */
01137         if (moveUp == NULL)
01138             goto cuddZddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01139         result = cuddZddSiftingBackward(table, moveUp, initial_size);
01140         /* move backward and stop at best position */
01141         if (!result)
01142             goto cuddZddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01143     }
01144     else if ((x - x_low) > (x_high - x)) {
01145         /* must go down first:shorter */
01146         moveDown = cuddZddSiftingDown(table, x, x_high, initial_size);
01147         /* after that point x --> x_high */
01148         if (moveDown == NULL)
01149             goto cuddZddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01150         moveUp = cuddZddSiftingUp(table, moveDown->y, x_low,
01151             initial_size);
01152         if (moveUp == NULL)
01153             goto cuddZddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01154         result = cuddZddSiftingBackward(table, moveUp, initial_size);
01155         /* move backward and stop at best position */
01156         if (!result)
01157             goto cuddZddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01158     }
01159     else {
01160         moveUp = cuddZddSiftingUp(table, x, x_low, initial_size);
01161         /* after that point x --> x_high */
01162         if (moveUp == NULL)
01163             goto cuddZddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01164         moveDown = cuddZddSiftingDown(table, moveUp->x, x_high,
01165             initial_size);
01166         /* then move up */
01167         if (moveDown == NULL)
01168             goto cuddZddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01169         result = cuddZddSiftingBackward(table, moveDown,
01170             initial_size);
01171         /* move backward and stop at best position */
01172         if (!result)
01173             goto cuddZddSiftingAuxOutOfMem;
01174     }
01175 
01176     while (moveDown != NULL) {
01177         move = moveDown->next;
01178         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *)moveDown);
01179         moveDown = move;
01180     }
01181     while (moveUp != NULL) {
01182         move = moveUp->next;
01183         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *)moveUp);
01184         moveUp = move;
01185     }
01186 
01187     return(1);
01188 
01189 cuddZddSiftingAuxOutOfMem:
01190     while (moveDown != NULL) {
01191         move = moveDown->next;
01192         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *)moveDown);
01193         moveDown = move;
01194     }
01195     while (moveUp != NULL) {
01196         move = moveUp->next;
01197         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *)moveUp);
01198         moveUp = move;
01199     }
01200 
01201     return(0);
01202 
01203 } /* end of cuddZddSiftingAux */
01204 
01205 
01219 static Move *
01220 cuddZddSiftingUp(
01221   DdManager * table,
01222   int  x,
01223   int  x_low,
01224   int  initial_size)
01225 {
01226     Move        *moves;
01227     Move        *move;
01228     int         y;
01229     int         size;
01230     int         limit_size = initial_size;
01231 
01232     moves = NULL;
01233     y = cuddZddNextLow(table, x);
01234     while (y >= x_low) {
01235         size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table, y, x);
01236         if (size == 0)
01237             goto cuddZddSiftingUpOutOfMem;
01238         move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01239         if (move == NULL)
01240             goto cuddZddSiftingUpOutOfMem;
01241         move->x = y;
01242         move->y = x;
01243         move->size = size;
01244         move->next = moves;
01245         moves = move;
01246 
01247         if ((double)size > (double)limit_size * table->maxGrowth)
01248             break;
01249         if (size < limit_size)
01250             limit_size = size;
01251 
01252         x = y;
01253         y = cuddZddNextLow(table, x);
01254     }
01255     return(moves);
01256 
01257 cuddZddSiftingUpOutOfMem:
01258     while (moves != NULL) {
01259         move = moves->next;
01260         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *)moves);
01261         moves = move;
01262     }
01263     return(NULL);
01264 
01265 } /* end of cuddZddSiftingUp */
01266 
01267 
01282 static Move *
01283 cuddZddSiftingDown(
01284   DdManager * table,
01285   int  x,
01286   int  x_high,
01287   int  initial_size)
01288 {
01289     Move        *moves;
01290     Move        *move;
01291     int         y;
01292     int         size;
01293     int         limit_size = initial_size;
01294 
01295     moves = NULL;
01296     y = cuddZddNextHigh(table, x);
01297     while (y <= x_high) {
01298         size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table, x, y);
01299         if (size == 0)
01300             goto cuddZddSiftingDownOutOfMem;
01301         move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
01302         if (move == NULL)
01303             goto cuddZddSiftingDownOutOfMem;
01304         move->x = x;
01305         move->y = y;
01306         move->size = size;
01307         move->next = moves;
01308         moves = move;
01309 
01310         if ((double)size > (double)limit_size * table->maxGrowth)
01311             break;
01312         if (size < limit_size)
01313             limit_size = size;
01314 
01315         x = y;
01316         y = cuddZddNextHigh(table, x);
01317     }
01318     return(moves);
01319 
01320 cuddZddSiftingDownOutOfMem:
01321     while (moves != NULL) {
01322         move = moves->next;
01323         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *)moves);
01324         moves = move;
01325     }
01326     return(NULL);
01327 
01328 } /* end of cuddZddSiftingDown */
01329 
01330 
01346 static int
01347 cuddZddSiftingBackward(
01348   DdManager * table,
01349   Move * moves,
01350   int  size)
01351 {
01352     int         i;
01353     int         i_best;
01354     Move        *move;
01355     int         res;
01356 
01357     /* Find the minimum size among moves. */
01358     i_best = -1;
01359     for (move = moves, i = 0; move != NULL; move = move->next, i++) {
01360         if (move->size < size) {
01361             i_best = i;
01362             size = move->size;
01363         }
01364     }
01365 
01366     for (move = moves, i = 0; move != NULL; move = move->next, i++) {
01367         if (i == i_best)
01368             break;
01369         res = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table, move->x, move->y);
01370         if (!res)
01371             return(0);
01372         if (i_best == -1 && res == size)
01373             break;
01374     }
01375 
01376     return(1);
01377 
01378 } /* end of cuddZddSiftingBackward */
01379 
01380 
01392 static void
01393 zddReorderPreprocess(
01394   DdManager * table)
01395 {
01396 
01397     /* Clear the cache. */
01398     cuddCacheFlush(table);
01399 
01400     /* Eliminate dead nodes. Do not scan the cache again. */
01401     cuddGarbageCollectZdd(table,0);
01402 
01403     return;
01404 
01405 } /* end of ddReorderPreprocess */
01406 
01407 
01421 static int
01422 zddReorderPostprocess(
01423   DdManager * table)
01424 {
01425     int i, j, posn;
01426 #ifdef __osf__
01427 #pragma pointer_size save
01428 #pragma pointer_size short
01429 #endif
01430     DdNode **nodelist, **oldnodelist;
01431 #ifdef __osf__
01432 #pragma pointer_size restore
01433 #endif
01434     DdNode *node, *next;
01435     unsigned int slots, oldslots;
01436     extern void (*MMoutOfMemory)(long);
01437     void (*saveHandler)(long);
01438 
01439 #ifdef DD_VERBOSE
01440     (void) fflush(stdout);
01441 #endif
01442 
01443     /* If we have very many reclaimed nodes, we do not want to shrink
01444     ** the subtables, because this will lead to more garbage
01445     ** collections. More garbage collections mean shorter mean life for
01446     ** nodes with zero reference count; hence lower probability of finding
01447     ** a result in the cache.
01448     */
01449     if (table->reclaimed > table->allocated * 0.5) return(1);
01450 
01451     /* Resize subtables. */
01452     for (i = 0; i < table->sizeZ; i++) {
01453         int shift;
01454         oldslots = table->subtableZ[i].slots;
01455         if (oldslots < table->subtableZ[i].keys * DD_MAX_SUBTABLE_SPARSITY ||
01456             oldslots <= CUDD_UNIQUE_SLOTS) continue;
01457         oldnodelist = table->subtableZ[i].nodelist;
01458         slots = oldslots >> 1;
01459         saveHandler = MMoutOfMemory;
01460         MMoutOfMemory = Cudd_OutOfMem;
01461 #ifdef __osf__
01462 #pragma pointer_size save
01463 #pragma pointer_size short
01464 #endif
01465         nodelist = ALLOC(DdNode *, slots);
01466 #ifdef __osf__
01467 #pragma pointer_size restore
01468 #endif
01469         MMoutOfMemory = saveHandler;
01470         if (nodelist == NULL) {
01471             return(1);
01472         }
01473         table->subtableZ[i].nodelist = nodelist;
01474         table->subtableZ[i].slots = slots;
01475         table->subtableZ[i].shift++;
01476         table->subtableZ[i].maxKeys = slots * DD_MAX_SUBTABLE_DENSITY;
01477 #ifdef DD_VERBOSE
01478         (void) fprintf(stderr,"shrunk layer %d (%d keys) from %d to %d slots\n",
01479                     i, table->subtableZ[i].keys, oldslots, slots);
01480 #endif
01481 
01482         for (j = 0; (unsigned) j < slots; j++) {
01483             nodelist[j] = NULL;
01484         }
01485         shift = table->subtableZ[i].shift;
01486         for (j = 0; (unsigned) j < oldslots; j++) {
01487             node = oldnodelist[j];
01488             while (node != NULL) {
01489                 next = node->next;
01490                 posn = ddHash(cuddT(node), cuddE(node), shift);
01491                 node->next = nodelist[posn];
01492                 nodelist[posn] = node;
01493                 node = next;
01494             }
01495         }
01496         FREE(oldnodelist);
01497 
01498         table->memused += (slots - oldslots) * sizeof(DdNode *);
01499         table->slots += slots - oldslots;
01500         table->minDead = (table->gcPercent * table->slots) / 100;
01501         table->maxCache = ddMin(table->maxCacheHard,table->slots);
01502     }
01503     /* We don't look at the constant subtable, because it is not
01504     ** affected by reordering.
01505     */
01506 
01507     return(1);
01508 
01509 } /* end of zddReorderPostprocess */
01510 
01511 
01527 static int
01528 zddShuffle(
01529   DdManager * table,
01530   int * permutation)
01531 {
01532     int         index;
01533     int         level;
01534     int         position;
01535     int         numvars;
01536     int         result;
01537 #ifdef DD_STATS
01538     long        localTime;
01539     int         initialSize;
01540     int         finalSize;
01541     int         previousSize;
01542 #endif
01543 
01544     zddTotalNumberSwapping = 0;
01545 #ifdef DD_STATS
01546     localTime = util_cpu_time();
01547     initialSize = table->keysZ;
01548     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:I_SHUFFLE %8d: initial size\n",initialSize); 
01549 #endif
01550 
01551     numvars = table->sizeZ;
01552 
01553     for (level = 0; level < numvars; level++) {
01554         index = permutation[level];
01555         position = table->permZ[index];
01556 #ifdef DD_STATS
01557         previousSize = table->keysZ;
01558 #endif
01559         result = zddSiftUp(table,position,level);
01560         if (!result) return(0);
01561 #ifdef DD_STATS
01562         if (table->keysZ < (unsigned) previousSize) {
01563             (void) fprintf(stdout,"-");
01564         } else if (table->keysZ > (unsigned) previousSize) {
01565             (void) fprintf(stdout,"+"); /* should never happen */
01566         } else {
01567             (void) fprintf(stdout,"=");
01568         }
01569         fflush(stdout);
01570 #endif
01571     }
01572 
01573 #ifdef DD_STATS
01574     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
01575     finalSize = table->keysZ;
01576     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:F_SHUFFLE %8d: final size\n",finalSize); 
01577     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:T_SHUFFLE %8g: total time (sec)\n",
01578         ((double)(util_cpu_time() - localTime)/1000.0)); 
01579     (void) fprintf(stdout,"#:N_SHUFFLE %8d: total swaps\n",zddTotalNumberSwapping);
01580 #endif
01581 
01582     return(1);
01583 
01584 } /* end of zddShuffle */
01585 
01586 
01600 static int
01601 zddSiftUp(
01602   DdManager * table,
01603   int  x,
01604   int  xLow)
01605 {
01606     int        y;
01607     int        size;
01608 
01609     y = cuddZddNextLow(table,x);
01610     while (y >= xLow) {
01611         size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table,y,x);
01612         if (size == 0) {
01613             return(0);
01614         }
01615         x = y;
01616         y = cuddZddNextLow(table,x);
01617     }
01618     return(1);
01619 
01620 } /* end of zddSiftUp */
01621 
01622 
01636 static void
01637 zddFixTree(
01638   DdManager * table,
01639   MtrNode * treenode)
01640 {
01641     if (treenode == NULL) return;
01642     treenode->low = ((int) treenode->index < table->sizeZ) ?
01643         table->permZ[treenode->index] : treenode->index;
01644     if (treenode->child != NULL) {
01645         zddFixTree(table, treenode->child);
01646     }
01647     if (treenode->younger != NULL)
01648         zddFixTree(table, treenode->younger);
01649     if (treenode->parent != NULL && treenode->low < treenode->parent->low) {
01650         treenode->parent->low = treenode->low;
01651         treenode->parent->index = treenode->index;
01652     }
01653     return;
01654 
01655 } /* end of zddFixTree */
